Tony Dungy said. Hear the entire interview in this CBS Philly SportsPod... Tony Dungy says he truly marveled over some of the things Michael Vick was able to do this season for the Eagles. He was calm in the pocket, he was hitting second, third, fourth receivers, throwing the ball well and just being in command of things. And then still with that ability to escape and get away from the rush and make plays out of nothing, Tony Dungy told KYW Newsradio. Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of` News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role .''
